trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_SEQ_00<tab>Higiri is eager to assist you.

TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_SEQ_01<tab>Higiri informs you that the 3rd Unit Braves, led by Yuyuhase, have recently left the Rising Stones. Their purpose: to escort Raubahn to his execution. Make your way to Highbridge and seek out Doware, who will apprise you of the unit's movements.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_SEQ_02<tab>According to Doware, Yuyuhase and the 3rd are bound for Halatali. Make your way to the training grounds in eastern Thanalan, and join Hozan at the entrance.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_SEQ_03<tab>Hozan informs you that Ilberd was seen entering Halatali mere moments before your arrival─proof positive that Raubahn is being held within.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Doware at Highbridge.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Hozan.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_000<tab>Shortly before you arrived, I received word from Limsa Lominsa that you were searching for General Raubahn.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_001<tab>As the Admiral will have informed you, he was recently moved from his cell in the Marasaja Pit.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_002<tab>At the same juncture, Yuyuhase and the 3rd Unit were observed leaving the Rising Stones.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_003<tab>This can be no simple coincidence. Their purpose, we believe, is to escort the Flame General to the scene of his execution.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_004<tab>Suffice it to say, we have people shadowing the 3rd. If you would join the hunt, pray seek out Doware at Highbridge, where I too am bound.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_005<tab>My comrades pursue the 3rd Unit Braves, even as we speak. If you would join the hunt, pray seek out Doware at Highbridge, where I too am bound.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>Yet again, our Doman friends prove their worth... Lolorito was a fool to refuse them asylum.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_ALPHINAUD_000_007<tab>Could she be the Doman contact of whom the Admiral spoke?
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_DOUWARE_000_010<tab>I have been expecting you. Time is of the essence, so I shall be direct.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_DOUWARE_000_011<tab>Yuyuhase and his men are bound for Halatali.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_DOUWARE_000_012<tab>We believe that this is where they intend to carry out the execution.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_DOUWARE_000_013<tab>Hozan is presently keeping watch over the entrance. Let us make haste and join him.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_ALPHINAUD_000_014<tab>Yuyuhase... The mere mention of the name calls to mind the moment I felt the kiss of cold steel against my neck...

TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HIGIRI_000_015<tab>It has been a while since last I wore this garb. Since I came to Revenant's Toll, my days have been spent in kitchens. Fear not, however: though I have learned to wield a skillet, I have not forgotten the use of a dagger.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HOUZAN_000_020<tab>You come at a good time, my friends. But moments ago, the traitor Ilberd arrived and entered Halatali.
TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_HOUZAN_000_021<tab>From this, we may be certain that General Raubahn is being held within.

TEXT_HEAVNA202_01600_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>Raubahn's ties to Halatali are well known. That Ilberd should choose this of all places to stage his execution is no coincidence. The <var 1A 02 /var>fiend<var 1A 01 /var>... Are there no depths to which he will not stoop?
